title: [Group] 3br1ba apt w/ Free Laundry - $1050
posting_body: ['About the place:', '-No broker fee!', '-Super awesome location!', "Conveniently located between Inman Square (Whole Foods, great restaurants, coffee shops, etc.) and Union Square (MORE great restaurants, Market Basket, a summer farmer's market, and so much fun stuff to do when there isn't a pandemic)", '-easy access to the 91, 86, 83 and CT2 buses (also a 15-20 min walk to Central Square/Red Line T, Longwood shuttle buses, CT1, 1, 47, 70 and 70A buses, and 15-minute walk from Harvard Square, as well)', '-On-street parking with MA plates/Somerville resident permit ($40/year) and it’s very easy to find parking (we also have 2-day visitor permits)', '-FREE Washer/Dryer in-unit', '-Dishwasher and garbage disposal installed in kitchen', '-Rooms have many windows and lots of light!', 'High ceilings and wood floors, too!', '-Backyard with porch facing garden and park', '-Safe neighborhood near Argenziano School', '-Central air conditioning and heating', '-Basement storage (belonging to our unit only)', '-Separate pet fee if applicable (if applicable)']
